settings.banner-subtitle: Look and feel like your best self.

settings.feeling-title: Get ready for that “best cut ever” feeling.
settings.feeling-text: As soon as you step foot inside one of our shops, you’re home. At Brothers’ Barbershop, we’re not satisfied until you are. Find a moment respite from city life, or simply a welcoming atmosphere to take a load off, while you get the best cut of your life. Kick back, and have a drink on us – we’re glad you’re here!

settings.awards-title:
we know you’re a superhero.
We’ll help you look like one, too.

settings.Transformation-text: Sure, you come to our shops for a great cut. But, it’s our mission to be even more than that. We believe that when you look your best, you feel and do your best, too. So, when we say “how can I help?”, we mean it.

settings.expectations-text: So, you’re ready to book an appointment. What next? Once you take that step toward looking and feeling your best, then you can rest assured that we’ll take care of the rest. We promise, you’re making a great choice. Here are a few things you can expect when you come for a cut at one of our shops.

settings.guarantee-text: Your satisfaction is our priority! If for any reason you are not 100% thrilled with your service, you can come back again, and we’ll make it right.

settings.booking-description-2: What do you like? We’ll make it happen.
settings.booking-description-3: Trust us, you’re gonna look amazing.

settings.faq-question-1: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.faq-answer-1: We accept all major bank cards in our shops and online payments for gift cards.
settings.faq-answer-2: Yes! You will be offered a complimentary drink when you arrive for your service. We have a great selection of drinks on offer, ranging from barista quality coffee, soft drinks (redbull etc), craft beers or a gin & tonic!
settings.faq-question-3: what if i'm not entirely satisfied?
settings.faq-answer-3: Customer satisfaction is what we build our reputation on. We have a triple check policy ensuring you are fully satisfied. Firstly, your barber will check before leaving the chair, next our reception will ask before payment and then a follow up email will be sent. If you are not satisfied at any stage, we will of course make a correction or any final adjustments you require.
settings.faq-answer-4: Yes! We have a wonderful international team of professional barbers and they all speak fluent English, including our reception team.
settings.faq-question-5: What are the latest COVID-19 rules
settings.faq-answer-5: We are currently operating under the 2G rule, but on Feb 12 we will change to the more relaxed 3G rule. No need for vaccination, just a negative test or proof of recovery will do just fine!
settings.faq-answer-6: Free parking is available at our 1220 location in the underground garage in the IZD tower. Make sure to get your ticket stamped when checking out. Regular street parking for Neubaugasse.
